sourcesContent:
import {useState} from 'react'; const UserInput = () => { useState() const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Submit') } const resetHandler = (event) => { console.log('Reset') } const inputChangeHandler = (input, value) => { console.log(value) } return (

{inputChangeHandler('current-savings', event.target.value)}} type="number" id="current-savings" />

{inputChangeHandler('yearly-contribution', event.target.value)}} id="yearly-contribution" />

{inputChangeHandler('expected-return', event.target.value)}} id="expected-return" />

{inputChangeHandler('duration', event.target.value)}} id="duration" />

) } export default UserInput;
